A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Too boring\, dreary\, convoluted and talky for a child to enjoy\, too incoherent and irrational for an adult to enjoy.

I see others have done a fine job pointing out the overwhelming\, unforgivable flaws of Last Jedi.  So awful it was actually poisoning my memory of the original movies\, but I think it will flush out of my mind in a few days.

I hear rumors the Han Solo garbage is going to be scrapped.  Let's hope and pray this is true and Disney stops desecrating the remains of Star Wars.
